meanings.sent1: The burnt wood had a cokelike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The black rocks were cokelike in texture.
meanings.sent3: The cokelike smell of the barbecue filled the air.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt cokelike after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The cokelike taste of the charred marshmallow lingered on his tongue.

meanings.definition: Having qualities similar to those of coke.
meanings.sent1: The old car emitted a cokelike exhaust smell.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had a cokelike sheen to it.
meanings.sent3: The cokelike sound of the fire crackling was soothing.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a cokelike depth that commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The cokelike intensity of her gaze made him uneasy.
